location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 32/12 Estates of British and British Indian Subjects'

physicalDescription.extent: The file is arranged in rough chronological order.

Foliation: the foliation sequence for this description commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 12; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. Two additional foliation sequences are present in parallel; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: The file contains office notes and correspondence relating to a number of claims by relatives to the estates of individuals who had died in Kuwait. The papers include witness statements, lists of possessions, and correspondence that discusses arrangements for the transferral of property. The correspondence is between the Political Agent, Kuwait (Major James Carmichale More), Shaikh Ahmad al Jabir as-Subah [Shaikh Aḥmad al-Jābir Āl Ṣabāḥ], and the Office of the Mutasarrif, Basra.

name.namePart: Office of the Mutasarrif of Basra
